titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords in Parliament assembled concerning the committee sitting at Goldsmiths Hall for composition of delinquents estates. Die Lunæ 1 Februarii 1646.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Order to print signed: Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Declares the Committee to be without authority. Withdrawn on 8 Feb. due to objections from the House of Commons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old Bayley
